name: AWSCodeDeployDeploymentGroupEc2TagFilters
description: Ec2TagFilters is a property of the AWS::CodeDeploy::DeploymentGroup resource that specifies which EC2 instances to associate with the deployment group.

properties.name: Type
properties.desc: The filter type. For example, you can filter instances by the key, tag value, or both. For valid values, see EC2TagFilter in the AWS CodeDeploy API Reference.

properties.name: Value
properties.desc: Filter instances with this tag value.
